39 2021-02-25 lip swelling Event: Allergic reaction on 3/24. The injection site began to itch around 9:30pm after taking a hot ... Read more
Close
Event: Allergic reaction on 3/24. The injection site began to itch around 9:30pm after taking a hot shower. Approximately 10 minutes later the injection site area swelled and became "hard" to the touch, then turn red, hot, and tender to the touch. The area affected was approximately 3 inches wide and 4 inches long - it covered the upper arm (deltoid muscle area). Within 5 minutes the itching sensation spread over the upper back on the left side and to the left side of my neck. Approximately 20 minutes later my bottom lip on the left-hand side swelled slightly and turned red and I had a slight difficulty swallowing. My breathing was not impeded. The reaction did not progress further (I had taken allergy medication to stop any further reaction). By 11pm the difficulty swallowing disappeared and the swelling in my lip reduced. By 5:30am I had no trouble with swallowing and there was no facial swelling. The swelling in my arm was reduced by half - although it was still warm, sensitive, and itched. Throughout the day (on 3/25) the swelling and redness at the injection site reduced. Two days after the start of the event, the area is still warm to the touch and will itch on occasion as will my lower left lip. Treatment: as soon as I recognized it was an allergic reaction, when the area swelled, I took half a Wal-Zyr 10mg tablet (so I took 5mg of Walgreen's generic brand of Zyrtec) - approximately 9:45pm on 3/24. I took the other half (5mg) of the tablet at 5:30am the next morning on 3/25. No additional medication has been taken since. Outcomes: The reaction was managed with the Wal-Zyr medication. Currently the injection area is slightly warm and itches on occasion, as does my lower left lip. There has been no change in this condition in the past 20 hours.
39 2021-02-25 vision blurred She was given the vaccine at 12:00. At 12:07 she (she is an RN employee here at the hospital) repor... Read more
Close
She was given the vaccine at 12:00. At 12:07 she (she is an RN employee here at the hospital) reported feeling as if she had lump in her throat and asked for some benadryl. Rapid response team was called at 12:08 as she became diaphoretic, flushed and reported blurred vision. MD ordered an IV to be started and a NS bolus x 1 liter. She broke out in hives on bilateral upper extremities. Benadryl, solumedrol, albuterol inhaler, zofran, scopolamine patch were all ordered and given to the patient. She reported that she felt some better and was transferred to the ER at 1245 for further monitoring.

39 2021-03-03 mouth tingling Pt received 1st dose of covid-19 vaccine during mass clinic. Pt was given 30 minute observation peri... Read more
Close
Pt received 1st dose of covid-19 vaccine during mass clinic. Pt was given 30 minute observation period due to history of allergic reaction to strawberries, which pt defined as tongue tingling. Approx 15 minutes into observation period, pt described feeling the same feeling of her tongue tingling with feeling slightly light-headed. Pt denied SOB, chest pain, itching. EMS evaluated pt and was not given any medication but instructed to take PO Benadryl once home and to call 911 if symptoms worsened. Her 4 Lead EKG was WNL. Pt left facility without issue though reported feeling "a little funny still" but denied feeling worse.
39 2021-03-04 eye swelling 19 days after the vaccine, I started to have some rash on the forehead, swollen left eye the next d... Read more
Close
19 days after the vaccine, I started to have some rash on the forehead, swollen left eye the next day. I thought it was allergies, but it didn?t get better with antihistamines, triamcinolone, and antibiotic . I went to the urgent clinic on the third day and was diagnosed with Shingles. I am prescribed with acyclovir for treatment. I am not sure if it?s related to the vaccine but something triggered it and I?m not in the normal age group that gets it.
39 2021-03-04 dry mouth, swollen tongue 40 minutes after injection my tongue and throat began to swell and then close. I had no saliva and ... Read more
Close
40 minutes after injection my tongue and throat began to swell and then close. I had no saliva and could not swallow without sipping on water. I stopped at a clinic to be near a facility in case I could not breath anymore. They watched me for a bit (though I did not fully "check in". The doctor suggested I get checked at an ER. I went to ER and sat in the ER parking lot for two hours waiting to see if my symptoms got worse. I did not want to use the ER unless I felt like I was in dire need. After the couple of hours my symptoms weekend (but were still there). I went to a friends place to not be alone in case the swelling increased again. The next night I felt back to normal. I have never had that reaction to anything, so I was a bit scared.
39 2021-03-04 mouth tingling Evening of 2nd approximately 6pm diarrhea began with increasing frequency throughout the night. Last... Read more
Close
Evening of 2nd approximately 6pm diarrhea began with increasing frequency throughout the night. Lasted through the night several times an hour into the next morning. Around midnight dizziness,, faint and muscle weakness set in with feeling of extreme pressure on neck, especially right side where shot administered. Arms became tingly, tongue became tingly, hard to keep awake. After 12 hrs of extreme diarrhea, passed out for 12hrs straight. Awoke dehydrated, extreme muscle weakness unable to walk or stand, light headed, nauseous, dizzy, unable to grip or exert force. Felt like head was detached from body due to extreme pressure on neck. Rapid resting heart rate in 90s (usual testing HR in 50s). Constant rolling waves of abdominal cramps brought dizziness with each cramp, acid reflux, bloating and gas. These symptoms lasted through the evening of the 3rd into the 4th. Considered going to ER for help, as extreme dizziness and muscle weakness prevented walking. Fell asleep. 6am March 4th developed fever of 101. Continued extreme dizziness, pressure on neck, muscle weakness and feeling faint and extreme lethargy throughout day. Fever subsided to 99 by evening of 4th. Ate plain rice evening of 4th, 1st time eating in over 48hrs. Immediately passed out. Match 5th still feeling weak, hard to stand, limited walking. Diarrhea has subsided, less pressure on neck and less dizziness. Feeling exhausted overall. Fall asleep easily and randomly.
39 2021-03-04 mouth numbness PATIENT DESCRIBED MOUTH AREA FEELS NUMB AND WAS SWOLLEN. PATIENT WAS INJECTED BENADRYL 50MG INTRAMU... Read more
Close
PATIENT DESCRIBED MOUTH AREA FEELS NUMB AND WAS SWOLLEN. PATIENT WAS INJECTED BENADRYL 50MG INTRAMUSCULARLY. SHE WAS REVISITED AND AFTER 30 MINUTES, MOUTH HAD DECREASED SWELLING.
39 2021-03-31 swollen tongue, mouth tingling 1 hour after receiving the second vaccination i started having an increased heart rate, high blood p... Read more
Close
1 hour after receiving the second vaccination i started having an increased heart rate, high blood pressure, lips where tingling, and tongue felt as if it was swelling, flushing sensation throughout my body and shaking in my hands.
39 2021-04-15 swollen tongue face felt droopy/diagnosed with Bell's Palsy; felt like her face was swollen; face became physically... Read more
Close
face felt droopy/diagnosed with Bell's Palsy; felt like her face was swollen; face became physically swollen and numb; left side of her face and the left "part of her tongue" became swollen; This spontaneous case was reported by a consumer and describes the occurrence of FACIAL PARALYSIS (face felt droopy/diagnosed with Bell's Palsy) in a 39-year-old female patient who received mRNA-1273 (Moderna COVID-19 Vaccine) (batch no. 031B21A) for COVID-19 vaccination. The occurrence of additional non-serious events is detailed below. The patient's past medical history included No adverse event (no medical history reported). On 12-Apr-2021, the patient received first dose of mRNA-1273 (Moderna COVID-19 Vaccine) (Intramuscular) 1 dosage form. On 12-Apr-2021, the patient experienced FACIAL PARALYSIS (face felt droopy/diagnosed with Bell's Palsy) (seriousness criterion medically significant), SWELLING FACE (felt like her face was swollen), HYPOAESTHESIA (face became physically swollen and numb) and SWOLLEN TONGUE (left side of her face and the left "part of her tongue" became swollen). At the time of the report, FACIAL PARALYSIS (face felt droopy/diagnosed with Bell's Palsy), SWELLING FACE (felt like her face was swollen), HYPOAESTHESIA (face became physically swollen and numb) and SWOLLEN TONGUE (left side of her face and the left "part of her tongue" became swollen) outcome was unknown. DIAGNOSTIC RESULTS (normal ranges are provided in parenthesis if available): On 12-Apr-2021, Computerised tomogram: negative negative for evidence of stroke. The action taken with mRNA-1273 (Moderna COVID-19 Vaccine) (Intramuscular) was unknown. Patient reports she was negative for respiratory distress or difficulty breathing. Treatment included two unknown oral antibiotics and oral steroids.; Sender's Comments: Based on the current available information and temporal association between the use of the product and the start date of the events, a causal relationship cannot be excluded.
39 2021-04-18 vision blurred As soon as I received it, about 2 minutes after, it was a drive thru event and my mom was also with ... Read more
Close
As soon as I received it, about 2 minutes after, it was a drive thru event and my mom was also with me in the car receiving the vaccine also. I was still waiting for the nurse to replace her bandaid since she was bleeding a little more than normal. As soon as the car got out of the tent, I was driving, it felt like my head was being drilled, my vision blurred, everything turned dark, I could not hear, I had a bad headache almost about to faint but I kept on driving slowly to get to the waiting area. By the time I parked, I removed my mask, open the car window and relaxed and just started inhaling deeply. I felt better soon after and spoke to the nurse there and she recommended drinking fluids the next 48 hrs. I felt dizzy, tired but not very sore like the first dose. 2 days later, I still feel dizzy, vision is blurry sometimes and occasional headache, a little tenderness on abdomen and feeling like I am catching my breath sometimes.
39 2021-04-26 sensitivity to light Numbness of face and lip; Face tingling; Felt sensitive to light; Nauseous; Really bad headache, lef... Read more
Close
Numbness of face and lip; Face tingling; Felt sensitive to light; Nauseous; Really bad headache, left side of face; Arm soreness; This spontaneous case was reported by a consumer and describes the occurrence of HYPOAESTHESIA (Numbness of face and lip) and PARAESTHESIA (Face tingling) in a 39-year-old female patient who received mRNA-1273 (Moderna COVID-19 Vaccine) (batch no. 047B21A) for COVID-19 vaccination. The occurrence of additional non-serious events is detailed below. The patient's past medical history included Hysterectomy. Concurrent medical conditions included Shellfish allergy, Egg allergy, Food allergy (dairy) and Food allergy (different food when she was a child). Concomitant products included MULTIVITAMINS [VITAMINS NOS] for an unknown indication. On 20-Apr-2021 at 12:00 PM, the patient received first dose of mRNA-1273 (Moderna COVID-19 Vaccine) (Intramuscular) 1 dosage form. On 20-Apr-2021, the patient experienced PAIN IN EXTREMITY (Arm soreness). On 20-Apr-2021 at 12:00 PM, the patient experienced HEADACHE (Really bad headache, left side of face). On 21-Apr-2021, the patient experienced HYPOAESTHESIA (Numbness of face and lip) (seriousness criterion medically significant), PARAESTHESIA (Face tingling) (seriousness criterion medically significant), PHOTOPHOBIA (Felt sensitive to light) and NAUSEA (Nauseous). At the time of the report, HYPOAESTHESIA (Numbness of face and lip), PARAESTHESIA (Face tingling), PAIN IN EXTREMITY (Arm soreness), PHOTOPHOBIA (Felt sensitive to light), HEADACHE (Really bad headache, left side of face) and NAUSEA (Nauseous) had not resolved. The action taken with mRNA-1273 (Moderna COVID-19 Vaccine) (Intramuscular) was unknown. Treatment medication included ibuprofen. Based on the information provided which includes a temporal association between the use of mRNA-1273 vaccine and onset of the reported events, a causal relationship with the product use cannot be excluded. Headache and nausea are consistent with the known safety profile of the product.; Sender's Comments: Based on the information provided which includes a temporal association between the use of mRNA-1273 vaccine and onset of the reported events, a causal relationship with the product use cannot be excluded. Headache and nausea are consistent with the known safety profile of the product.
